mapper.select: SELECT p.prc_id, p.PROCESS_NAME, g.gid AS g_id, g.sku_name AS g_goodsName, g.sku AS g_goodsCode FROM gds_process p LEFT JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON p.prc_id = pg.prc_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid WHERE p.prc_id = pg.prc_id

SELECT p.prc_id, p.process_name,
g.gid AS g_id, g.sku_name AS g_goodsName, g.sku AS g_goodsCode FROM gds_process p LEFT JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON p.prc_id = pg.prc_id LEFT JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid WHERE p.process_name = #{processName}
SELECT prc_id id, process_name FROM gds_process

SELECT g.gid id, g.sku_name goods_name, g.COVER_IMAGE_URI, g.GOODS_UNIT, g.GOODS_SPECIFICATION, gp.vip_price, gp.RETAIL_PRICE, g.cid category_id, g.brd_id brand_id, g.gtid type_id FROM emp_employee e INNER JOIN gds_goods_price gp ON gp.store_id = e.store_id AND gp.start_time < NOW() AND (gp.end_time IS NULL OR gp.end_time > NOW()) INNER JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON pg.gid = gp.gid INNER JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid WHERE e.emp_id = #{userId} AND pg.prc_id = #{processId}

SELECT g.gid id, g.sku_name goods_name, g.COVER_IMAGE_URI, g.GOODS_UNIT, g.GOODS_SPECIFICATION, gp.vip_price, gp.RETAIL_PRICE, g.cid category_id, g.brd_id brand_id, g.gtid type_id FROM cus_customer c INNER JOIN gds_goods_price gp ON gp.store_id = c.store_id AND gp.start_time < NOW() AND (gp.end_time IS NULL OR gp.end_time > NOW()) INNER JOIN gds_process_goods pg ON pg.gid = gp.gid INNER JOIN gds_goods g ON g.gid = pg.gid WHERE c.cus_id = #{userId} AND pg.prc_id = #{processId}
